item.title: Migration from Wordpress to Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description:
In this post, I have documented all the steps I took to migrate this website from Wordpress to Hugo and host it on GitHub Pages.

Hugo is the world’s fastest static website engine. It is written in Golang.

GitHub Pages provides free hosting space for the static sites.

item.title: Develop MVC Application using Spring Boot and AngularJS
item.description:
In this article, I will be developing a Model-View-Controller (MVC) application using AngularJS Framework, which would consume the REST APIs exposed by the Spring Boot Microservice application, created in this article.

If you want to understand more about MVC architecture, go through this article.

item.title: Develop MVC Application using Spring Boot and JSP
item.description:
In this article, I will be developing a Model-View-Controller (MVC) application using Spring Boot and JSP for the Microservice Application that was created in Develop Microservice Application Using Spring Boot and H2 Database, which exposes the REST APIs as a backend application.

However, in this article, I will create an User Interface (UI) for that application using JSP in Spring Boot, in order to make Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture work.

item.title: Develop Microservice Application Using Spring Boot and MongoDB Database
item.description:
In this article, I will be developing a Microservice Application using Java Technology and Spring Boot Framework, which will be the backend and expose all CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) Operations as the REST APIs.

I will be using No SQL Database known as MongoDB Database for persisting(storing) the data.

item.title: Develop Microservice Application Using Spring Boot and H2 Database
item.description:
In this article, I will be developing a microservice application using Java Technology and Spring Boot Framework, which will be the backend and expose all CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) Operations as the REST APIs.

I will be using Relational Database known as H2 Database, it is also known as an Embedded Java Database, for persisting(storing) the data.
